tit.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園補助競技場
tit.e: Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field

sen.j: 京都市西京極総合運動公園補助競技場（きょうとしにしきょうごくそうごううんどうこうえんほじょきょうぎじょう）は、京都府京都市右京区にある京都市西京極総合運動公園陸上競技場兼球技場のサブグラウンドで、京都市が所有・運営している。
sen.e: Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field is a subfield of the Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and is owned and managed by the Kyoto City.
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field is a subfield of the Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and is owned and managed by Kyoto City.
Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Park Supplementary Field is a subfield of the Kyoto Nishikyogoku Athletic Stadium in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, and is owned and managed by Kyoto City.

sen.j: 2002年のFIFAワールドカップでは、そのメインスタジアムと共に公認キャンプ候補地にもなった。
sen.e: The supplementary field, as well as its main stadium, was on the official candidate list for the 2002 FIFA World Cup training camps.
The supplementary field, as well as the main stadium, was on the official candidate list for the 2002 FIFA World Cup training camps.
The supplementary field, as well as the main stadium, was on the official candidate list for the 2002 FIFA World Cup training camps.

sen.j: スタンドの最前列はほぼピッチレベルに設置されており、スタンドとフィールドを区切る柵などはない。
sen.e: Front-row seats are arranged on almost the same level as the field and there is no fence between the seats and the field.
Front-row seats are arranged on almost the same level as the field and there is no fence between the seats and the field.
Front-row seats are arranged on almost the same level as the field and there is no fence between the seats and the field.

sen.j: スタンドには、高さも角度もないため、観戦環境としては決して恵まれているとは言えない。
sen.e: Seats are not angled, nor are they elevated, so the supplementary field may not be an ideal place to watch the games.
Seats are not angled, nor are they elevated, so the supplementary field may not be an ideal place to watch the games.
Seats are not angled, nor are they elevated, so the supplementary field may not be an ideal place to watch the games.

sen.j: 西京極総合運動公園内には他に、プロ野球の公式戦も行われる京都市西京極総合運動公園野球場も立地している。
sen.e: The Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park also includes Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium where professional baseball teams also play their official games.
The Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park also includes Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium where professional baseball teams play their official games.
The Nishikyogoku Comprehensive Sports Park also includes Nishikyogoku Baseball Stadium where professional baseball teams play their official games.

tit.cmt: 他と用語を合わせました。

sen.e: Capacity: 200 (seats)
Capacity: 200 (seats)
Capacity: 200 (seats)
Score board
Score board
Score board

sen.j: ロッカールーム（シャワーブース併設）
sen.e: Locker room (with shower stalls)
Locker room (with shower stalls)
Locker room (with shower stalls)

sen.j: 関西社会人リーグ（特にホームグラウンドの指定はされていないが、AS.Laranja Kyoto・京都紫光クラブ・FC京都BAMB1993がホームゲームを行っている）
sen.e: Kansai Soccer League (none of the teams designates the field as its home ground, but AS.Laranja Kyoto, Kyoto Shiko Club and FC Kyoto BAMB1993 have played home games there.)
Kansai Soccer League (none of the teams designates the field as its home ground, but AS.Laranja Kyoto, Kyoto Shiko Club and FC Kyoto BAMB1993 have played home games there.)
Kansai Soccer League (none of the teams designates the field as its home ground, but AS. Laranja Kyoto, Kyoto Shiko Club and FC Kyoto BAMB 1993 have played home games there.)
sen.cmt: スペース補足しました。

sen.j: 京都FAカップ（天皇杯全日本サッカー選手権大会の京都府代表決定戦）
sen.e: Kyoto FA Cup (a tournament to decide the representative of Kyoto Prefecture to the Emperor's Cup All Japan Soccer Tournament)
Kyoto FA Cup (a tournament to decide the representative of Kyoto Prefecture for the Emperor's Cup All Japan Soccer Tournament)
Kyoto FA Cup (a tournament to decide the representative of Kyoto Prefecture for the Emperor's Cup All Japan Soccer Tournament)
